moves.1. e4:
Classic opening.

-------
This is my first annotate. Probably, more wisdom can be taken from comments to movements, then from my notes. I have read other annotations to take some example, but still it is my first. Greetings to my opponent. I had big fun to play with you.
moves.1... e5 2. d4: This is my style opening, it's not stable, but really effective for short parties.
moves.2... Bd6: I see it as mistake. getting pawn and building position on d4 is better response. Also that this bishop is locked in cage, with nothing-having-to-do pawn on d7.
moves.4. Nf3 c5: No, moving pawn on two times, thank you for dead move! I wouldn't beat him with pawn on d5 to not lost position and keep Bishop dead.
moves.5. Bc4: position constructed with pawn on d5
moves.8... Ba6: this bishop blocked his queen side what I was thankful to. I had no reason to attack it.
moves.9. Qd3 Qe7: Queen on dead position. Black has closed themselves.
moves.11. Bxa6: I prefer to Queen side, it's so powerless
moves.11... hxg5: I was happy, better was to kill the other one Bishop to prevent...
moves.12... g4: Pawn attack, it will come up a few times
moves.13. Bxa8: My Knight has nowhere to escape not weakening King hidden in the corner
moves.13... c4: After Q:c4 g4:f3 with fainting my defence
moves.15... Bc5: Now is time to free my Bishop, so he run away alive
moves.18. dxc6: Old position will no longer be needed, black Bishop is free, time to exchange position on material benefits
moves.18... Rc8: Now I thought I can use this attack.
moves.19. b4 Bd4: Wise, no more loosing figures or pawns
moves.21... Nxe4: Killing my pawns, he's getting greedy!
moves.29... Qb4 30. Rf4 Qb2: After beating c2 I could lost this easily.
moves.32. Qe1: I need tower to finish this game on this position
moves.32... Rd6: even this I can't mate him, because of Knight guarding e4. Waiting for his last jump I thought about...
moves.33. c7: ...my pawn, which traveled so far from d4
moves.34... Kh7 35. Rh4+ Kg6: Tower on h6 was better idea.
moves.36. Qe4+: Qe4+ It was this only one movement that if I couldn't do, I could be lost.
moves.36... Kf6 37. Qcf5#:
And mate.

----
That's all. I hope you post a few comments by the road, or PM me so I can change a few things to make it better. Thank you for everything and good luck in your GK games!
